title: Afghanistan, The Fed, VC, And Inflation (Podcast)
itunes:title: Afghanistan, The Fed, VC, And Inflation (Podcast)
description:
Annmarie Hordern, Washington correspondent with Bloomberg News, joins the show to discuss her story on Bloomberg helping an employee’s family escape the Taliban. Danielle DiMartino Booth, CEO and Chief Strategist at Quill Intelligence, LLC, discusses the Fed and outlook for a recession. Josh Chapman, Managing Partner at Konvoy, joins the show to discuss venture capital and the investment landscape for video games. Keith Laing, Automotive Regulations Reporter with Bloomberg News, joins the show to discuss the Inflation Reduction Act and the way it impacts the US auto industry. Sadek Wahba, Founder, Chairman and Managing Partner of I-Squared Capital and Member of Council on Foreign Relations, talks about Inflation Reduction Act creating a Green Bank, its key investments, and how it impacts inflation. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
